description.short: AgileBlue is a SOC-as-a-Service platform that’s proven to detect threats faster and more accurately across your entire digital infrastructure and cloud
description.long:
AgileBlue is a 24/7 SOC-as-a-Service, SOAR and EDR providing managed breach protection including monitoring, detection, and automated response to secure your cloud, network, and endpoints.

First, we combine user behavior analytics and machine learning to detect anomalous behaviors in both devices and humans. Next, our predictive analytics and cyber risk scoring prioritizes risks
based on patterns and trends. Finally, our proprietary Silencer technology reduces false positives by 95%, so we can focus on real threats.

Our tech is intelligent and automated, but we take a custom approach for every client we work with, analyzing and detecting exactly what you need it to. Our team of cyber experts are always
just a call away. You can rest easy because we’ve got this.
